xmlquery.actuatorDelete: Delete from smiot_actuator where idActuator=? and idRelay=?
xmlquery.actuatorOnOff: Update smiot_actuator set command = ? where idActuator = ? and idRelay=? and idSite=?
xmlquery.actuatorOffPerSite: Update smiot_actuator set command = 0 where idSite?
xmlquery.actuatorEdit: Update smiot_actuator set idActuator=?,idRelay=?,idSite=?, updatedBy=? where idActuator=? and idRelay=? and idSite=?
